thread.title: Wall St. closes higher in volatile session

title: Wall St. closes higher in volatile session
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 7, 2015, 21:12 BST - UK Markets closed Wall St. closes higher in volatile session Reuters – 8 minutes ago View Photo 
A specialist trader works at his post on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange July 6, 2015. REUTERS/Brendan … NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks ended a volatile session higher on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 recovering from a drop of more than 1 percent as energy shares gained alongside an afternoon rebound in crude oil prices. 
The Dow Jones industrial average (.DJI) rose 95.94 points, or 0.54 percent, to 17,779.52, the S&P 500 (.SPX) gained 12.84 points, or 0.62 percent, to 2,081.6 and the Nasdaq Composite (.IXIC) added 5.52 points, or 0.11 percent, to 4,997.46. 
(Reporting by Ryan Vlastelica; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
